\def\dotgrapha#1{\newpage
	\includegraphics[scale=0.6,angle=0, trim=0 0cm 0cm 0cm]{#1}}

\def\dotgraphb#1{\newpage
	\includegraphics[width=\textwidth,
	                 height=\textheight,
	                 trim=0 0cm 0cm 0cm]{#1}}
\def\dotgraphc#1{\newpage
	             	\includegraphics[%width=\textwidth,
